description:
Futaba Odagiri is the energetic transfer student who befriends Teru Hayama, the class president who is meaner than she looks, and Youko Nishikawa, a former rich girl who still acts like a princess. Three very different girls who only share one thing: the kanji for leaf in their names. Balancing school and life is hard enough, but what about dealing with clashing personalities on top of it all? 

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/huusun)

Originating from Xebec. Although now is freelancer, currently engaged in training young directors for [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/) as of May 2024. Debuted as a director on [Wonder Egg Priority](https://anilist.co/anime/124845/).
Takayuki Yamamoto is an episode director.
Enishi Ooshima is a Japanese animator and storyboard artist, who has worked for the studio [White Fox](https://anilist.co/studio/314/White-Fox).
Masatoyo Takada is an episode director.
Enishi Ooshima is a Japanese animator and storyboard artist, who has worked for the studio [White Fox](https://anilist.co/studio/314/White-Fox).
